Package proj

Class UserValidation

java.lang.Object
proj.UserValidation
public class UserValidation
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the verification class for STARS admin and student users
Since:
2020-11-19
Version:
1.0
Author:
DSAI/1 Group 5

  • Constructor Details

    • UserValidation

      public UserValidation()
      constructor to initialise studentlist, schoollist and adminlist.

  • Method Details

    • loginStudent

      public boolean loginStudent​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, byte[][] SaltArray, java.lang.String[] HashedPasswords)
      method that is called whenever student logins. The user's input login credentials will be matched with the studentList's student login credentials
      Parameters:
      username - The username that the user has input.
      password - The password that the user has input.
      SaltArray - Returns the byte array that stores salt string of the Student's password
      HashedPasswords - Returns the hashed password of the Student
      Returns:
      true if login credentials matched with studentList, else value of false will be returned.

    • studentCanAccess

      public boolean studentCanAccess​(java.lang.String username)
      method that is used to check if the student who logged in is within the access period or not. If he/she is, then the student will be able to access Stars, else access will be denied, a denied access message will be shown in the console.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student who logged in.
      Returns:
      true if the accessperiod of the student, determined by the school is within the current time period, else value of false will be returned.

    • loginAdmin

      public boolean loginAdmin​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      If user logged in as admin, if login is successful, admin console will be launched.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of admin who logged in.
      password - password of admin who logged in.
      Returns:
      true if user is indeed an admin, else returns false.

    • checkValidUsername

      public boolean checkValidUsername​(java.lang.String username, java.util.ArrayList<Student> studArray)
      method that is used to check if username input is valid
      Parameters:
      username - Username of student input
      studArray - ArrayList of Students
      Returns:
      true if username of this student is found in the ArrayList, else returns false.
